title: Gazebo doesn't install correctly when built with colcon

content.raw:
While SDFormat and Ignition packages all work find, gazebo seems to still have some CMake issues preventing the right path from being generated in the `cmake_install.cmake` script

I suspect this line is part of the problem, although I don&~~#39~~;t have a working patch to provide yet:

```
set (CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX /usr CACHE STRING "Install Prefix")
```

The other issue is coming from how things that should end up in the `share` directory are installed, but I haven’t figured out where the issue there might be.
